name: Oathkeeper
description: Paladins who have deepened their divine connection through unwavering devotion to their sacred oaths, becoming living embodiments of their divine principles.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Divine energy that powers holy spells and abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per 6 seconds, +3 when smiting evil creatures
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast divine spells and channel holy power
Some abilities require maintaining a divine connection, consuming mana over time
Prayer increases mana regeneration rate by 400% but requires remaining stationary
Can channel mana into weapons and armor for divine enchantments

resource_systems.name: Divine Favor
resource_systems.description: Blessing from the divine that empowers righteous actions
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per hour, additional points gained through upholding oaths and defeating evil
mechanics: Divine Favor can be spent to enhance weapon attacks with holy power
Can be used to empower healing spells or protective auras
Acts as a resource for powerful oath abilities
Violations of paladin code can result in temporary loss of Divine Favor
Can be shared with allies to grant them temporary divine blessings

resource_systems.name: Oath Power
resource_systems.description: Manifestation of an Oathkeeper's unwavering commitment to their sacred vows
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when acting in accordance with oath tenets, decreases when violating them
mechanics: Increases by 10 when performing actions that exemplify oath tenets
Decreases by 20 when acting against oath tenets
At maximum Oath Power, enter an exalted state with enhanced abilities
Can be spent to invoke powerful oath-specific abilities
Different oaths generate and consume Oath Power in different ways

class_mechanics.name: Greater Divine Smite
class_mechanics.description: Channel enhanced divine power through weapon strikes to devastate enemies
effects: Can infuse weapon attacks with holy energy for significant additional damage
Smite damage is tripled against undead and fiends
Critical hits with Divine Smite cause enemies to be stunned for 3 seconds
Each successful smite generates 200% additional threat against the target
Can apply various divine effects based on the active oath

class_mechanics.name: Enhanced Lay on Hands
class_mechanics.description: Channel powerful healing energy directly into wounded allies
effects: Heal allies by touch for substantial amounts based on paladin level
Can be used to cure diseases, neutralize poisons, and remove curses
Healing pool refreshes after a long rest and partially refreshes after a short rest
Can distribute healing among multiple targets simultaneously
Healing can now restore spiritual damage and mental afflictions

class_mechanics.name: Expanded Divine Aura
class_mechanics.description: Project a powerful aura of divine energy that significantly affects nearby allies and enemies
effects: Provides stronger passive bonuses to nearby allies based on the active aura
Can maintain two different auras simultaneously
Aura range increased by 50% compared to base paladin
Presence causes fear in evil creatures and inspiration in good ones
Auras can now provide specific benefits based on the active oath

class_mechanics.name: Oath Manifestation
class_mechanics.description: Physically manifest the power of your oath, temporarily transforming into a divine avatar
effects: Transform appearance to reflect the nature of your oath
Gain specific powers and abilities based on your oath
Inspire allies and intimidate enemies within visual range
Immune to fear, charm, and corruption while manifested
Manifestation lasts for 1 minute and requires 50 Oath Power to activate

skill_trees.name: Greater Oath of Devotion
key_abilities: Holy Avenger: Weapon becomes a legendary holy weapon for 1 minute
Divine Sanctuary: Create a zone where allies cannot be harmed
Banish Evil: Send undead, fiends, and other evil entities back to their native planes

skill_trees.name: Greater Oath of Justice
key_abilities: Divine Tribunal: Mark multiple enemies for judgment, increasing damage taken
Executioner's Strike: Instantly slay evil creatures below 20% health
Aura of Retribution: Enemies that attack allies suffer divine retribution damage

skill_trees.name: Greater Oath of Sacrifice
key_abilities: Ultimate Sacrifice: Redirect all damage from allies to yourself for 10 seconds
Redemptive Suffering: Convert damage taken into healing for allies
Immortal Resolve: Continue fighting for 30 seconds after reaching 0 health

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 5 points in any paladin oath skill tree
challenges: Defeat a powerful undead or fiend without taking damage

hero_classes.name: Templar
hero_classes.description: Oathkeepers who embody the purest ideals of light and righteousness, becoming divine champions against darkness.

hero_classes.name: Warlord
hero_classes.description: Oathkeepers who focus on martial excellence and leadership, commanding armies in the name of order and stability.

hero_classes.name: Oathbreaker
hero_classes.description: Oathkeepers who have betrayed their sacred vows, corrupting their divine power for selfish or malevolent purposes.

legendary_items.name: Blade of Sacred Oaths
effects: Divine Smite damage increased by 30%
Generates 1 Divine Favor when defeating evil creatures
Can store up to 3 prepared smites for instant activation

legendary_items.name: Shield of the Faithful
effects: Divine Aura range increased by 10 meters
Reduces damage taken by nearby allies by 15%
Can reflect spell damage back at casters once per minute

lore: Oathkeepers represent paladins who have transcended the ordinary bounds of their calling, forging an even deeper connection with the divine through unwavering devotion to their sacred oaths. Where ordinary paladins are guided by their vows, Oathkeepers become living embodiments of them, their very essence intertwined with the principles they uphold. This profound connection manifests physically in moments of great need, allowing them to temporarily transform into divine avatars that reflect the nature of their oath. The path to becoming an Oathkeeper is arduous, requiring not only martial skill and divine favor but also absolute conviction and numerous tests of faith. Those who succeed find their divine abilities greatly enhanced, able to channel more powerful healing, protection, and holy wrath against the forces of darkness. Their expanded auras affect larger areas with stronger effects, and their divine smites can devastate even the most powerful undead and fiends. Oathkeepers serve as inspirational leaders, their mere presence bolstering the resolve of allies and striking fear into evil creatures. Whether they continue on the path of righteousness, focus on maintaining order, or fall to corruption, all Oathkeepers command tremendous respect and influence in the world.
